details: Evaluate the dog and owners to customize a training plan based on the needs of the dog and owner
Would your organization like to have Pretzel and myself come visit your facility for a therapy vist? If so, please make an appointment.
This service includes, but not limited to AKC STAR Puppy and Pre-CGC _(Canine Good Citizen)_
Training with the owner at your home. 1 hour weekly sessions, with homework.
Evaluate dogs tempurment, domaninece and submissive traits, as well as sensitivity levels.
Training based on Star Puppy, Canine Good Citizen, CGC Advanced, Urban CGC and Public Access.
How to communicate effectivly with your therapy dog and clients during therapy visits.
